data.name: Defect Process
data.detailed_description:
COMBAT

  • Combo melee and ranged attacks together for relentless offense
  • Dash, blink, and zip around with movement skills + advanced techniques
  • Launch enemies upwards and juggle them in the air

FEATURES

  • Diverse weapon movesets and mechanics
  • Dynamic loadouts enabling unique playstyles
  • Layered soundtrack progressing over the course of a game run
  • Unlockable weapons, skills, and music
data.about_the_game:
COMBAT

  • Combo melee and ranged attacks together for relentless offense
  • Dash, blink, and zip around with movement skills + advanced techniques
  • Launch enemies upwards and juggle them in the air

FEATURES

  • Diverse weapon movesets and mechanics
  • Dynamic loadouts enabling unique playstyles
  • Layered soundtrack progressing over the course of a game run
  • Unlockable weapons, skills, and music
data.short_description: Hack n' slash through increasingly dangerous arenas with a high action free-form combat system

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron J Series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 400
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 400
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

  • OS: Ubuntu 19.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
